name: Midnight Customers
description:
Midnight Customers is a narrative driven horror game about working the night shift at an isolated gas station.

You are the newest night-shift employee at the GP gas station. Check out the strange customers that visit your store. Meet the regulars. Complete tasks around the store as you pass the time. Figure out what's going on.

We are releasing on Steam along with a content update soon. If you purchase through itch.io you will receive a Steam key when we fully release.

Controls:
-WASD to move
-E to interact
-Left click to interact/drag
-Escape to open the menu
-Q to speed up dialogue
-F to turn on flashlight

Thank you for playing our game!
Follow us on Twitter!
Encounter any bugs? Let us know here!
